name: Jaime Jorge,
title: Renowned International Violinist
quote: I am so thankful to have had the opportunity to work with Andrea. She is extremely gifted, intuitive, artistic and easy to work with. I look forward to our next project!

name: Mark Hinca,
title: KJIL Station Manager
quote: Andrea's creative abilities are truly God given. From the simple to the complex, she listens well and incredibly creates and completes projects beyond my expectations. She’s flexible and gracious to those of us that always seem to need adjustments made here and there. I highly recommend her and her work!

name: Glenn Hascall,
title: KJIL and KHYM Station Manager
quote: Andrea has an innate sense for design. Her original artwork has also provided the perfect customization for some very special projects. Andrea has assisted me with online art as well as book cover and traditional print projects. That leaves her name as a first responder for my custom design needs.

name: Krystal Wallace
quote: Andrea's attention to detail makes her fantastic to work with!  She really listens to what you want and makes the finished product something special and unique.
